data.name: Evil Dreams
data.detailed_description:
Uncover the mystery of the town of Marwood

At the end of the Wild West era, Marcus, a teenager from a noble family, decides to find out why his city suffers from evil dreams. To find the reason, he goes to his neighbors' nightmares, where he may find out the truth or get stuck forever.

Evil Dreams - 2D adventure with elements of psychological horror and a variable plot. You have to travel between the real world and the world of the dreamers, find out the hidden secrets of the inhabitants of the city, try don't lose mind and much more. And fully hand-drawn 2D graphics in the author's style, combined with an immersive soundtrack and a historically correct setting will help you with this.


Game Features:

  • Hand-drawn 2D graphics in the author's style.
  • Recreated from archival photographs of the world of the USA of the late 19th century.
  • You influence the development of the story and the fate of Marcus.
  • Travel between worlds, where you will have to look for clues and remember key places in a dream.
  • A living world filled with colorful characters, references to other works and secrets.
  • The variability of the passage. You can just help the residents of the city, or you can immerse yourself in history and find out the hidden evil that has been haunting Marwood since the origins of time.
  • Problems of moral choice and life of Native Americans of that time.
  • And much more!

    Welcome to Mordox!

    Mordox, the world of nightmares, is stupefying. On your way you will meet characters and their destinies, dark and light souls, but the development team itself does not know what really happened in Marwood. So any action you take can lead to dire consequences. Look for hidden clues and decide the fate of a dying town!

data.short_description: Evil Dreams is a dark adventure about nightmares, telling the story of a boy living in the late 19th century and forced to face ancient evil. Delve into the world of dreams to find out the truth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: All the rights belong to Fitbie

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: All the rights belong to Fitbie

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: All the rights belong to Fitbie
